reviewText: If you are expecting to see comedy by Ron White, think again!  There is only about 10 minutes of Ron at the beginning of the DVD.  The rest of the DVD is other comedians that are not funny at all! Plus, there is a few singers doing a couple of songs along with Ron White's singing song-writer wife? It was all very disappointing.
thanks  great item
Would have liked it better if all Ron White
Witty and wild as usual.
Always funny
Ron White is always funny
Got this for my dad. He loves it
We need more people that will do more for our troops they risk there life so that we can do what ever we want
Once again Ron provides a great look at life through his warped way of thinking.  If he don't crack you up - CALL 911!
I love Ron White but I really messed Jeff, Bill, and Larry  they made a really great team. Ron was great just not enough of him on it for my taste

If you are interested in just Ron White than get Ron White: A little Unprofessional, he tells all the same jokes as on this show plus a few one liners, and a story joke about what happento him on a yacht. If you want a mix of comedians such as Alex Ramundo, Kathlien Madegan, Lewis Black along with a number of others hosted by Ron White, than by all means get this DVD
Loved it he's one of my favorites! I would love to see him live. Are you kidding me with the amount of words I need to write? Next time it's going to be du, du , du!
I always love Ron White and this version was really entertaining!  Ron White is true to form in this Salute.
Gave us the best laughs we'd had in ages.  It was a great way to cheer us up after some tough times!
As always Ron made me laugh. I love this guy. The first and only comedian who has ever made me laugh.
Ron White is a screem. He is so casual when he is doing his act. I just saw he in person last year and just love him.
Ron White is one of the best comedians around and this DVD is no exception!  Well done with great comedians.

I got this for my dad for Father's Day, he likes Ron and the Blue Collar guys, and especially since this was for the troops, but their were too many f-bombs,etc. for him and my step-mom. Sent his back, kept my copy. Do be advised - if you want the clean version, record it off CMT.
Another good DVD to watch.  some people can write a book on nothing, I can't and won't.  All I can say is I liked it, I think you will to

I have been a Ron White fan for years now and when I heard he had a special where all the proceeds go to benefit the Armed Forces-- I promptly ordered 5 copies and have given to family and friends as gifts!!  Not only is Ron one of the funniest comedians out there, he's now one of the most generous!  If you enjoy a great laugh and want to be patriotic, BUY Ron's Salute to the Troops!!

I originally bought this DVD because I heard Ron White interviewed on the radio and he mentioned that all proceeds benefit the armed forces foundation.  I thought, what the heck, I'll do my part and have a few laughs.  Now that I actually bought the DVD I'm thrilled to say that I would have bought this without the knowledge of knowing that I'm helping out the Armed Forces Foundation.  Ron is hilarious as always and the other comedians had me howling as well.  Love the special music guests too!  Keep it coming tater salad!
I used to like Ron White's sense of humor but he is getting progressively deranged and filthy. Not even funny anymore; just plain gross.
Really funny classic Ron White with lots of great comedians!
funny
disappointing
Ron White is just too funny!
great stuff
Always funny

I've watched all five of these annual events and love every one of them. This DVD is from the first show; I wish the others were available on DVD, too -- I'd buy them all. If you've seen this one on TV, the DVD includes additional footage of each comedian, plus several musical performances, including by John Oates (of Hall & Oates) and Margo Rey, Ron White's wife (great performance).
Excellent
fast shipping works great
